DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to show whether the Neo system is safe and works in people with heart failure. The study is currently in long-term follow up.
DOC.brief_title: Barostim HOPE4HF (Hope for Heart Failure) Study
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective, randomized study describing the safety and efficacy of the Neo system in approximately 60 heart failure subjects with a left ventricular ejection fraction equal or less than 35 percent.
DOC.criteria: Age 21 years or above. On optimal, guidelinedirected (per the American Heart Association/American College of Cardiology guidelines), stable, heartfailure medications and dose for at least 4 weeks prior to screening. Known or suspected baroreflex failure or autonomic neuropathy. Myocardial infarction, unstable angina, syncope, cerebral vascular accident, sudden cardiac death (SCD), or received defibrillation therapy within 3 months. Heart failure secondary to a reversible cause or treatable condition.
